text: Hi, which HubSpot plan do you use?
Hi <@U01ASFZL4UA> - I am on Sales professional.
You don't have this option in Workflows?

<@U01ASFZL4UA>, I have, but I am not able to find the right trigger for this. I mean, 'Send internal email notification' is the result, but what property do I choose to trigger this action? I get incoming email to my conversation Inbox. How do I set a trigger that says - when a new email is received, I want to trigger a workflow?
Sorry, I didn't read your question well.
Maybe to try with Recent sales email replied date?
Is that last email sent from you, from HS conversation tool, from your email (outlook, 365), automated?
I am sending Outbound emails via Mailchimp, and when someone replies, it comes as a Conversation in my Inbox, which is connected to over 10 email boxes.
My MailChimp is integrated to my HS, but all I see is these options as 'Enrollment Triggers':
A lot of time, my team misses out on replying to certain emails, as there are a lot incoming emails. So I want to set a notification to be sent, 3 days after an email is received.
